name: Sacrifice (itch) (michaelaranda)
description:
Built during the Ludum Dare 44 Game Jam, Sacrifice has you sacrificing your health to level up your stats so that you can fight your way through a temple

CONTROLS:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

Left Click: Attack

E Key: Harvest (when prompted)

  • Bugfix Update: 29 APR 2019
    • Fixed score not calculating correctly
  • Bugfix Update: 30 APR 2019
    • Fixed broken camera trigger
    • Fixed UI obscuring gates
    • Fixed enemy rigidbodies not disabling on death
